title: Need help from Riot
body: I can't play league because after logging in, the client said it couldn't connect to maestro. I've been looking for the solutions for a couple of months now and I can't fix the problem.

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  Cases with not being able to connect to maestro usually indicate a network issues failing to establish a connection.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to strengthen your connection and fix any settings that may be blocking the connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Thank you a lot!
I'll try to fix it on the weekends

This might not be your issue, but it happened to me once because I accidentally pinned the client itself to my taskbar as opposed to the launcher. When opening directly to the client, it failed every time. Worth a try to see if thats the problem?
